item.title: A robust bio-inspired approach to event-driven object recognition
item.description:
Tomorrow Antoine Grimaldi will present our joint work on "A robust bio-inspired approach to event-driven object recognition" at #cosyne2021 check-out the poster now https://t.co/DUNQPcv1mx or meet him tomorrow during the poster session ! pic.twitter.com/wKTJPZbR6B

— laurentperrinet (@laurentperrinet) February 25, 2021

  • see the poster online on the Hopin platform
